headline: Kroger Unveils Customer's 2025 Yearly Checkout
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today shared that customers saved billions through discounts, promotions and everyday savings throughout 2025. With the Yearly Checkout feature, customers can view a personalized summary of their annual savings, shopping habits and grocery preferences.

headline: ShopOne enters Texas with acquisition of Houston retail centre
summary: The shopping centre was acquired through a partnership with Pantheon and an undisclosed institutional investor.

raw.headline: ShopOne enters Texas with acquisition of Houston retail centre
raw.summary: The shopping centre was acquired through a partnership with Pantheon and an undisclosed institutional investor.

headline: Does Raised Guidance After a Soft Quarter Change The Bull Case For Kroger (KR)?
summary: Kroger recently reported mixed Q3 CY2025 results, with flat year-on-year sales, revenue below market expectations, and a GAAP loss per share that fell well short of analyst forecasts. Despite the weaker quarter, management raised full-year earnings guidance above consensus, signaling confidence in the underlying business amid ongoing regulatory scrutiny of the proposed Albertsons merger. With Kroger’s full-year earnings guidance now topping analyst expectations despite a soft quarter, we’ll...
